channel.title: THE OHC EXPERIENCE
channel.description: an extension of Old House Channel Radio, our monthly podcast featuring new and classic house, disco, club, soul, and anything else that has a groove and that you can dance to, blended and mixed up into a sonic concoction that can induce aural esctasy...lol...its great music to groove to...contact: mrmixwell@oldhousechannel.net
channel.itunes:subtitle: Old House Channel Radio in a portable format...
channel.itunes:author: stephen grant
channel.itunes:summary: an extension of Old House Channel Radio, our monthly podcast featuring new and classic house, disco, club, soul, and anything else that has a groove and that you can dance to, blended and mixed up into a sonic concoction that can induce aural esctasy...lol...its great music to groove to...contact: mrmixwell@oldhousechannel.net

item.title: Mixwell Method 06/05/12 show
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 06/05/2012 SHOW PLAYLIST HOUR ONE: Get Ya Buzz On-DJ Pierre feat. Byron Stingily and Paul Johnson Die For You(Soul Oasis Mash)-Prince Keep On(Original)-Soundealers Getting Loose(An Afflickted Soul Vocal Mix)-Polyrhythm, DJ Basil Follow Your Heart(Jose Carretas Son Live Vocal)-Kevin Hedge feat. Rik Galactik African Healing Dance(Atjazz Astro Rmx)-At One feat Wyoma What A Way(Carlos Vargas Soul Mix)-Kenny Bobien with Swift from DJN Project I Can Only Be Me(Joe Crugliano Tech House Mix)-Vicky Martin and Joe Crugliano Not Fade(Charles Webster's Deep Dub)-Bucie Dubside Down-Dub Taylor (My Baby)He Loves Me(Kevin Hedge Studio Mix)-Viola Sykes Rolling Hills (Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios remix)-Jill Scott I'm Every Woman(Disco Mutation to a Diva Remix)-Whitney Houston Do You Speak French?(12 Shades edit)-Nite School HOUR TWO: Golden Lady(Scrimshire Edit)-Stevie Wonder Action-Orange Krush To Be Real-Cheryl Lynn Rock Your World-Weeks and Company I Hear Music in the Streets-Unlimited Touch Slap Slap Likedy Lap-Instant Funk Swedish Disco Holiday-Honom vs. Madonna Everybody-Madonna Wordy Rappinghood-Tom Tom Club White Horse-Laid Back Erotic City-Prince/Sheila E Dream It(US Rave Mix)-Static I Can Feel It(Fun Mix)-Dreamhouse Love So Special-Ceybil Can't Stop the House(Ins)-Thompson and Lenoir Work It To The Bone(Vocal)-LNR Sume Sign Say(The Masters Rmx)-House of Gypsies FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!
item.dc:creator: stephen grant
item.itunes:summary:
MIXWELL METHOD 06/05/2012 SHOW PLAYLIST HOUR ONE: Get Ya Buzz On-DJ Pierre feat. Byron Stingily and Paul Johnson Die For You(Soul Oasis Mash)-Prince Keep On(Original)-Soundealers Getting Loose(An Afflickted Soul Vocal Mix)-Polyrhythm, DJ Basil Follow Your Heart(Jose Carretas Son Live Vocal)-Kevin Hedge feat. Rik Galactik African Healing Dance(Atjazz Astro Rmx)-At One feat Wyoma What A Way(Carlos Vargas Soul Mix)-Kenny Bobien with Swift from DJN Project I Can Only Be Me(Joe Crugliano Tech House Mix)-Vicky Martin and Joe Crugliano Not Fade(Charles Webster's Deep Dub)-Bucie Dubside Down-Dub Taylor (My Baby)He Loves Me(Kevin Hedge Studio Mix)-Viola Sykes Rolling Hills (Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios remix)-Jill Scott I'm Every Woman(Disco Mutation to a Diva Remix)-Whitney Houston Do You Speak French?(12 Shades edit)-Nite School
HOUR TWO: Golden Lady(Scrimshire Edit)-Stevie Wonder Action-Orange Krush To Be Real-Cheryl Lynn Rock Your World-Weeks and Company I Hear Music in the Streets-Unlimited Touch Slap Slap Likedy Lap-Instant Funk Swedish Disco Holiday-Honom vs. Madonna Everybody-Madonna Wordy Rappinghood-Tom Tom Club White Horse-Laid Back Erotic City-Prince/Sheila E Dream It(US Rave Mix)-Static I Can Feel It(Fun Mix)-Dreamhouse Love So Special-Ceybil Can't Stop the House(Ins)-Thompson and Lenoir Work It To The Bone(Vocal)-LNR Sume Sign Say(The Masters Rmx)-House of Gypsies
FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm
To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod

Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: Mixwell Method 05.22.2012 show
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 05/22/2012 SHOW HOUR ONE: Intro-"Welcome Back Kotter" Only You(Cajual 20 Year Anniversary Mix)-Cajmere and Russoul feat Dajae We Got The Funk(mikeandtess boot edit)-Positive Force Haven't You Heard(mikeandtess boot edit)-Patrice Rushen Doug's So Glad Ur Here(Doug's Touched by Your Presence Mix)-Joey Negro, Doug Willis You Got Me(Dan Aslow and Joe Luketti mix)-Chocofunks feat. Andrea Love Heaven(Kerri's 6:23 Again Mix)-Kerri Chandler/Christopher McCray Piccolo Player-Robin Harris Changing Times(DJ Spen and the MuthaFunkaz Vocal Remix)-Polyphonics feat.Sanne Life Story(Booker T Mix)-Angie Stone Ghetto Life(Sugar Groove REmix)-Rick James What A Way(Original Mix)-Kenny Bobien and Swift of DJN Project The Light(Duce Martinez Vox Mix)-Kenny Bobien Une Nouvelle Humanite(Andy Compton's PENG Mix)-Cathy Battistessa Follow Your Heart(Jose Carretas Son Live Vocal Mix)-Kevin Hedge feat. Rick Galactik Fugue In Baltimore(DJ Spen, Thommy Davis, Gary Hudgins Orchestral Fusion Mix)-Ron Hall, Thommy Davis Muthafkka(Heavy Mix)-Oscar P vs. Hank Moody HOUR TWO: Intro-"Fat Albert" Pump Me Up-Trouble Funk Bustin Loose-Chuck Brown and the Soul Searchers Apache-Incredible Bongo Band Give It Up or Turn It Loose-James Brown Melting Pot-Booker T and the MGs Soul Makosska-Manu Dibango On The Beat(A Discobaby Stomping Mix)-BB&Q Band Dance A Little Bit Closer-Salsoul Orchestra feat. Charo Ooh I Love It(Love Break)(Shep Pettibone Rmx)-Salsoul Orchestra A-Freak-A-Lemon Moon Boots(Tom Moulton Mix)-Orlando Riva Sound Jerky Rhythm-Erotic Drum Band No More Tears(Enough Is Enough)-Donna Summer/Barbra Streisand FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: Mixwell Method 05/15/2012 show
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 05/15/2012 PLAYLIST HOUR ONE: I'll Always Love My Mama(Mixwell Edit)-The Intruders So Sweetly(Kenny Carpenter Big Apple Mix)-M+S feat. Shawm Escoffery I Don't Understand(Main Mix)-Redsoul Transformation(House Music)(Funky House Mix)-Aron Prince What A Way(Original Mix)-Kenny Bobien and Swift from DJN Project All Of Me(Swift Vidal Remix 1)-Robin S Love Will Find A Way(Demo's House Tool)-Bobby and Patti L.I.E.(estranjeros ghetto touch)-Ndambi Violet(Ospina-Oscar P Remix)-Oscar P, Marcus Pearson Something(Swift DJN Project Mix)-Juan Sanchez Across 110th Street(Mixwell 2012 Re-edit)-Bobby WOmack Blindman Running(OCean Deep Mix)-Domscott Murder(Original Mix)-Daniel Dexter Shiver EP(Mikeandtess REmix)-Serious-Man feat. Angel Rolling Stone(Jamsteady Remix)-The Weeknd Wonderful(Terry's Main Club Mix)-Terry Hunter feat. Terisa Griffith HOUR TWO: Last Night Changed It All-Esther Williams KNock Em Out Sugar Ray-E.U. Slave To The Rhythm(Remix)-Grace Jones Back To Life(Album Mix)-Soul II Soul Puerto Rico(Hoody Instrumental)-The Frankie Cutlass Show IF(Tee's Freeze Mix)-Janet Jackson Get Up and Dance-Freedom A Rollerskating Jam Named Saturdays-De La Soul Sombodys Loving You(Original Mix)-Klassique Shake It Up(Do the Boogaloo)-Rod Mary Hartman, Mary Hartman-Sounds of the Inner City It Looks Like Love(12 Inch Version)-Goody Goody Trinidad-John Gibbs Rock It TO The TOp-Mantus You Make Me Feel(Mighty Real)-Sylvester

item.title: Mixwell Method 05/01/12 playlist....
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 05/01/12 SHOW playlist... "A KISS-FM tribute, some classic house, and some new tracks to boot..." PLAYLIST(only one long one this time...) Moments of My Life-Inner Life Seconds-Loleatta Holloway Glad To Know You-Chas Jankel I've Just Begun To Love You-Dynasty Hungry-Hanson and Davis Video Burnout-Little Toni Marsh Reach Up-Toney Lee Good Times-Chic Everybody Needs Somebody Sometime(part 2)-Ann Margaret Find A Way-Russ Brown Dynamite-Stacy Lattisaw Try It Out-Gino Soccio Trapped(Original)-Colonel Abrams Drifting-Jomanda Your Attitude-Kim Cummings Face It(Dub It)-Master C & J The Sound-Reese and Santonio What A Way(0riginal Mix)-Kenny Bobien and Swift from DJN Project Tunda(CinCitys Yazz REmix)-DJ Cesar feat. Petty Beautiful(Spiritchaser Mix)-Jask feat. Jocie Take Me Home(Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios Remix)-Cher What A Fool Believes(Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios Remix)-Doobie Brothers Silly Love Songs(Mixwell 2012 re-edit)-Paul McCartney and Wings The Message(Erazzerhead Edit)-Oscar P and C. Scott My Sunshine(Soul Oasis Edit2) FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: Mixwell Method 04/24/12 show...
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 04/24/12 SHOW PLAYLIST... Just one mix this time-but still just as enjoyable... PLAYLIST: A Song For You(Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios Remix)-Donny Hathaway Gunjenje-Bhabha Betasweet Emat Em Yawa(A Talk With My Ancestors)(Mushroom Boyz Spritual Mix)-King Bayaa Oya's Dance(Oya's Beating Beat)-Wil Milton In My Next Life(An Afflickted Soul Instrumental Mix)-Core Via Soul Black Man(EL's Classic Conga Mix)-Brown Sugah Kwenzeka-DJ Coffee What A Way(Original Mix)-Kenny Bobien/Swift of DJN Project Gotta Give Thanks(Church House Mix)-The Jersey Maestros feat. Baby Boy Steve Williams Street of the Sun(Timmy Regisford/Adam Rios Remix)-Jay J The Message(Erazzerhead Edit)-Oscar P and C. Scott Only You(Timmy Regisford Rmx)-Teddy Pendergrass It Seems To Hang On(DJ Spen Edit)-Ashford and Simpson Bourgie Bourgie(Core Via Soul Remix)-Ashford and Simpson Ghetto Life(Sugar Groove Remix)-Rick James Dance The Dance-GIno Soccio Missing The Testify(Mikeandtess mashup)-Carlos Vargas feat. Jay Williams Aint No Mountain High Enough-MuSol vs. Seb Skalati vs. Diana Ross Free Man(DJ Cratebug Edit)-South Shore Commission Hot Shot(Guido Osorio Remix)-Barbara Tucker Most Precious Love(Dennis Ferrer Future 3000 Mix)-Blaze feat. Barbara Tucker

item.title: Mixwell Method 04/17/12 show playlist....
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 04/17/12 SHOW PLAYLIST HOUR ONE: Ghetto Life(Sugar Groove Remix)-Rick James Thriller(Promo)-Motafied Beats Sume Sign Say(The Masters Mix)-House Of Gypsies The Tea(acapella)-Chocklate Imagination(RC Main Mix)-Roland Clark feat. Madame Simone Ride Like The Wind(Timmy Vocal Rmx)-Christopher Cross Adore(Foremost Reprint)-Prince Back To Me(Jimpster Dub)-Manuel Tur Raindrops(M60 Remix)-DJN Project Feelin The Music(Vocal Mix)-Musol Glad I Found You(Ethan White Remix)-DJ Gomi feat. Louie Balo and Yasmeen Miracles(Soul Therapy Remix)-Jersey Maestros feat. Jessica James Gotta Give Thanks(Church House Mix)-Jersey Maestros feat. Baby Boy Steve Williams Sunshine Hotel(Jamie Lewis Club Mix)-Jamie Lewis w/ Cynthia Marley Love You Some More(Cevin Fisher Original Love Mix)-Cevin Fisher Ti Fi La Ou(Ospina and Oscar P REmix)-Cedric Van and Roman Paletti Interlude(Original Mix)-Phaze Dee Still Want You(original)-Allen Craig Ghetto Life(Sugar Groove Mix)-Rick James HOUR TWO: No Way Back(Ins)-Adonis Running(Percapella)-Information Society Get On The Funk Train-Munich Machine Keep Smiling-Carrie Lucas Vertigo(Relight My Fire)-Dan Hartman/Loleatta Holloway Crying(Larry Levan Mix)-Instant Funk I Love Music-O Jays Free Man-South Shore Commission My First Mistake(Danny Krivit Re-edit)-The Chi-Lites FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: Mixwell Method 04/10/12 show...
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 04/10/12 show playlist... Special show-taking you back to the earlier days of Jack...some classic tracks to get your memories going and your feet flowing... PLAYLIST: Time To Jack-Chip E inc Like This(Dub Mix)-Chip E and K-Joy Jack Your Body(Homemade)-Steve "silk" Hurley My Love is Guaranteed-Sybil Freedom(Factory Mix)-The Children French Kiss(12 inch Mix)-Lil Louis and the World Women Beat Thier Men-Submission feat. Cevin Fisher Mind Games(underground mix)-Quest feat. Liz Torres 1040-House Syndicate The Key-T.C. Crew Backfired(Joey Negro Club Mix)-Masters at Work feat. India Love and Happiness(Yemaya y Ochun)-River Ocean feat India Spin Spin Sugar(Armands Dark Garage Mix)-Sneaker Pimps House Music-Eddie Amadour Burning(Vibe Mix)-MK Follow Your Dreams-Michelle Weeks Still In Love(Me'lissas in the House Mix)-Me'lissa Morgan Check This Out-Hardhouse Deep Inside-Hardrive TO DOWNLOAD: (right click, "save target as") http://www.oldhousechannel.net/mp3/mixwellmethod041012show.mp3 TO LISTEN: (click link) http://www.oldhousechannel.net/mp3/mixwellmethod041012show.m3u FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: MIXWELL METHOD 04/02/12 podcast....
item.description: MIXWELL METHOD 04/02/12 SHOW.. PLAYLIST: HOUR ONE: My Mistake(Edit Mix)-JMJ The Edit King The More I Get, The More I Want(Main Mix)-Davidson Ospina feat. David Walker Low Deep T(Remix Part One)-Low Deep T Be Yourself(Charles Webster Mix)-Charles Webster Feat. Diviniti Someone Like You(Timmy Regisford and Adam Rios Remix)-Adele Rolling Stone(Jamsteady REmix)-The Weekend Take Care(Swift of DJN Project Rmx)-Drake feat. Rihanna Raindrops(V Underground Mix)-DJN Project I Love Rolling Stones(DJmikeandtess boot mix)-Dollcombers vs. The Tempations Silly Love Songs(2012 Dirty Filter edit)-Paul McCartney and Wings Give Me A Reason(Kaoz 623 vocal)-Duce Martinez feat. Krystine Walker Sometimes(Original Mix)-Audiowhores In The Morning(Orig Vocal Mix)-The Smoke feat. Queenie You The Feeling(Maurice Joshua Mix)-Wayne Williams Starchild(Bob Sinclar Chase the Star Mix)-B.M.R. Disco Life(Original Mix)-Royal Music Paris HOUR TWO: Once In A Lifetime-Talking Heads Tell Me Im Not Dreaming-Was(not was) Thanks To You-Sinnamon Love Honey, Love Heartache-Man Friday Changes-Imagination It Should Have Been You-Gwen Guthrie Skip To My Lou-Finis Henderson Youre The One For Me(Shep Pettibone Remix)-D-Train You Dont Know-Serious Intention Dextrous(The Downbeat Mix)-Nightmares on Wax Music Is The Answer-Colonel Abrams Weekend-Class Action I Called U-Lil Louis and the World FOR BACK EPISODES AND MORE: http://www.oldhousechannel.net/method.htm For the OHC EXPERIENCE: http://ohc.podomatic.com To follow me: @stevemixwell on twitter...for method discussion #mixwellmethod Join the OHC Radio Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Baldwin-NY/OHCradio/107718775949331 Thanks again for all your support!!!

Thanks again for all your support!!!

item.title: Mixwell Method 03/19/12 Show

R.I.P Don Cornelius...

item.title: MIXWELL METHOD-Loleatta Holloway Tribute Mix
item.description: ..originally to be broadcast on the 03/27/11 MIXWELL METHOD, this one hour mix does not begin to do justice or to scratch the surface on Loleatta's incredible body of work, but it does showcase a few of her classic (and a few of her lesser-known) songs in original and remixed form, showcasing both her original timelessness, and the ability of her material to reinvent itself with the changing times. Loleatta was a one of a kind, and she will be deeply missed...rest in peace Loleatta, your labor has born much fruit... PLAYLIST: The Greatest Performance of My Life-Loleatta Holloway I May Not-Loleatta Holloway Dreamin(Shellshock Reconstruction Mix)-Satoshie Tomie feat. Loleatta Holloway My Loleatta(Mixwell's Tribute Re-edit)-Loleatta Holloway Love Sensation(Todd Terry 100 Remix)-Loleatta Holloway Vertigo(Relight My Fire)-Dan Hartman feat. Loleatta Holloway So Sweet-Loleatta Holloway Strong Enough(Larry Levan vocal)-Loleatta Holloway We're Getting Stronger-Loleatta Holloway
item.dc:creator: stephen grant
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: OHC EXPERIENCE 28 "The Cure for Cabin Fever"
item.description: OHC EXPERIENCE 28 "the cure for cabin fever" As the winter becomes drearier, I realize that you need some stimulus to enjoy where you are-to pick up the rug and turn up the sound and reminisce about warm days, and barbeques, and block parties, and roller skating, and swimming pools, and dancing on the beach...times where the snow shovel and boots were at the back of the closet, not on your feet and by the door...allow this collection of sounds from yesteryear to take you there... PLAYLIST: Feel Alright-Kamiko I Specialize in Love-Sharon Brown Hopscotch-Gwen Guthrie Way Out-Steve Arrington's Hall of Fame Beat Box-Art Of Noise Heaven and Hell-20th Century Steel Band Get Up and Dance-Freedom Single Life-Cameo Let Me Love You-Force MD's A Night to Remember-Shalamar Over Like A Fat Rat-Fonda Rae Let's Go All The Way (down)-Brenda and the Tabulations Love Thang-First Choice COme Let Me Love You(Shep Pettibone Remix)-Jeanette Lady Day Love This Way-Lee Prentiss Good Life (Bon Bon Vie)-TS Monk What I Got Is What You Need(Dub Mix)-Unique She Can't Love You-Chemise We Got The Funk-Positive Force DO It Any Way You Wanna(Tom Moulton mix)-People's Choice Music Is My Life-Patti La Belle
item.dc:creator: stephen grant

item.title: OHC EXPERIENCE 25 "The Mirrorball Existence"
item.description: OHC EXPERIENCE 25 "The Mirrorball Existence" from the ashes of the DBA...its the Mirrorball Existence...a look back at some classic cuts from the disco, club, and house era that tore up the floors and shaped the sounds that we listen to now... PLAYLIST: Without You-Touch Love Fixation(Dub Mix)-Touch Dying to be Dancin-Empress Love it(Coldcut Mix)-Society What is Love-Dee-Lite Instinctual(David Morales Remix)-Imagination Release The Tension-Colonel Abrams Falling In Love-Sybil Music is the Key-JM Silk Love Honey, Love Heartache-Man Friday Shut Up-Moonfou Time To Jack-Chip E Inc Soul Makossa-Manu Dibango Ma Foom Bey(Love Chant Version)-Cultural Vibe Hey Boy(Rough Mix)-Tammy Lucas Mary Hartman Mary Hartman-Sounds of the Inner City Moon Child(Joey Negro Edit)-Captain Skyy Look Me Up-Blue Magic Over And Over-Sylvester More info-mrmixwell@oldhousechannel.net, or @stevemixwell on Twitter... Reminder-the MIXWELL METHOD- Every Saturday 11pm EST global1fm.com http://www.global1fm.com
